projectGridLines.title: Graphics Engineering
projectGridLines.description:
Strong knowledge in C/C++, Assembly languages and Test development methodologies

Strong knowledge in Computer/Graphics Architecture, System knowledge

Strong knowledge in debugging skills and scripting languages

Skill sets: C/C++/Comp/Graphics Arch, Scripting languages

projectGridLines.title: CPG – PSAV
projectGridLines.description:
Work on aspects related to FPGA architecture, flows, circuits.

The work will help in driving some of the architecture, flows and circuits features for future generations

of FPGA architecture.

The role exposes individuals to a broad range of technical areas which will help them to understand

work culture, technical problem solving and decision making in companies like AMD.

The candidate will be mentored by a senior engineer and will be assigned a problem that he will jointly

own with the mentor and will work towards solving specific aspects of the assigned problems.

At the end of the internship, the candidate will be exposed to basics of FPGA architecture, aspects of

FPGA design flows, aspects of FPGA circuits, simulation-tools, modeling approaches and will have

gained experience of working in high performing teams.

Skill sets: Skilled in basic circuit concepts, digital electronics, digital circuit design using MOSFETs,

circuit simulations using SPICE or equivalent tool, Python scripting. Projects in the area of ML/DL, digital

system design on FPGAs (w/ projects) and Verilog coding.

Traits expectation: Skilled in basic circuit concepts, digital electronics, digital circuit design using

MOSFETs, circuit simulations using SPICE or equivalent tool, Python scripting. Preferred: Projects in

the area of ML/DL, digital system design on FPGAs (w/ projects) and Verilog coding.

projectGridLines.title: Converging Two Regression Management Systems at the UI Front
projectGridLines.description:
The project aims to merge two systems at the UI level, utilizing Vue.js to create a unified

interface capable of communicating with both systems seamlessly. The backend APIs of these systems

are containerized and hosted in Kubernetes on the Azure platform.

Skill sets: Exposure in Vue.js for front-end development, familiarity with containerization and

Kubernetes for backend deployment, knowledge of Python and FastAPI for backend development,

experience with database management (specifically PostgreSQL).

Traits expectation: : Strong problem-solving skills, proficient coding abilities, adaptability to work with

diverse technologies, ability to communicate effectively within a team, attention to detail, and a proactive

approach to learning new concepts and technologies.

Expected learning: Gain expertise in FastAPI for building robust backend APIs, acquire knowledge of

Kubernetes for efficient deployment and management of containerized applications, deepen

understanding of database management with PostgreSQL.

Specific courses required for project execution:

1. Programming fundamentals course to strengthen coding skills.

2. Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) course to enhance problem-solving abilities.

3. Exposure to Web Development courses is preferre

projectGridLines.title: Server SOC DV
projectGridLines.description:
System-On-Chip (SOC) Design Verification

Skill sets: Knowledge of compute architecture such as x86 or ARM domain based SOCs/Cores.

• Any Verification methodology involving OOPs concepts of C++ and experience is a plus.

• Must have excellent knowledge of design & verification flows.

• Experience in writing test plans and test cases

• Excellent hands-on debug skills


Specific courses required for project execution: Program Languages : Verilog, System Verilog,

C, C++, Scripting: Shell , Perl, Ruby

projectGridLines.title: Co-op Engineer
projectGridLines.description:
The SSE Strategic Alignment and Analytics team ensures that the Software

Systems Engineering organization driving product and software quality at AMD is a well-

oiled machine. The team develops the strategy and initiatives to drive alignment across the

organization and with the rest of the company. Data and analytics, and the ability or

mechanics to convey these insights, play a key role to the team’s success.

• As a full-stack web developer with an interest in data and analytics, you will become

familiar with the vast ecosystem of tools, processes and data sources making up the

software development lifecycle that produces the graphics driver. From these sources you

will harness and analyze data, derive insights, create dashboards and convey the narratives

to audiences of varying seniority. You will support the team to build interfaces that enable

users of varying backgrounds to access and analyze data. Opportunities abound to explore

areas around strategy, operations and program management.


Skill Sets:

Knowledge and experience in full-stack web development (Front-end: HTML, CSS, JavaScript;

Backend: ASP.NET/ASP.NET Core MVC) is preferred

Proficiency in a modern object-oriented programming language such as Python, JavaScript or C# is

preferred

Proficiency in database skills like SQL is preferred.

Familiarity with web graphing libraries (D3.js, Google Chart, Chart.js, etc.) is a plus

Familiarity with MS Power BI or other business intelligence and analytics tools is a plus .

projectGridLines.title: Co-op Engineer
projectGridLines.description:
Help solve our team with ML & AI based tasks to improve efficiency in our

turnaround time, faster debug, and new automation suggestions for all the ASIC

implementation tools and process used. Must be good in Python and be familiar with

existing ML based algorithms and recent AI developments.

projectGridLines.title: Co-op Engineer
projectGridLines.description:
Develop, debug, bring up and performance tuning of graphics UMD drivers for

Windows/Linux/Android

• Work with key customers for feature implementation and issue solving

• Work on pre-silicon, silicon bring up and post-silicon tasks and issue solving

• Collaborate with upstream/downstream teams

Skill sets: Excellent C/C++ programming skills

• OpenGL/Vulkan driver development experience

• Linux/Android and/or Windows development experience

• Knowledge of computer hardware architecture

• Knowledge of and/or experience with Shader Compiler is a plus

• D3D/Vulkan/OpenGL (ES) graphics application knowledge and experience is a plus

• Familiarity with performance analysis tools

projectGridLines.title: Synthesis CAD flow support as well as synthesis / functional ECO regressions
projectGridLines.description:
Supporting synthesis CAD flow issues for AMD SOC design teams as well as

understanding the regression framework for AMD TileBuilder synthesis and functional ECO CAD flows

Skill sets: CMOS Transistor fundamentals, Logic design, Verilog/SystemVerilog, RTL to GDS

flow, Basic scripting


Expected learning: new skills in synthesis CAD flows, CAD flow automation,

regression framework


Specific courses required for project execution: VLSI Logic Design, RTL-to-GDS flow labs, VLSI

CAD, Transistor design

projectGridLines.title: Co-op Engineer.
projectGridLines.description:
As an intern in this role, you will work on system level workload characterization

and performance modeling for SOC components of accelerators (FPGA). You'll identify architecture

bottlenecks and predict future gen performance. You'll work with a team of experienced engineers,

interact with archictect stakeholders and learn industry-standard tools and methodologies.

Skill sets: C or C++ or python programming (REQUIRED)

Processor Architecture (REQUIRED)

Anlaysis of Algorithms.


Specific courses required for project execution: CSE/EC - Modeling and

Simulation, Documentation

projectGridLines.title: Development of next generation x86 micro-processor
projectGridLines.description:
Microprocessors are at the heart of every computation engine. X86 Core serves as the

basic building block for all of these compute engines. X86 processor is one of the most complex IP in

the semiconductor industry. We at AMD are creating the next generation x86 processors to take the

computational prowess to the highest level that is possible. This multi-billion transistor complex IP design

uses the latest development tools, methodologies, processes and are developed using cutting edge

technology nodes.

Skill sets: Understanding of computer architecture, microprocessor pipeline, cache organization is

required. Good hands on coding and problem solving ability using high level design and verification

languages (C, C++, SV, Verilog) required. Having understanding and experience with scripting

languages (perl, python etc) is a plus. Strong digital design concept and problem solving skills.


Expected learning: This opportunity gives the experience of complex IP, microprocessor design and

development. It provides a platform to learn the low power design techniques, design and verification

tools, flows and methodology experience.

Specific courses required for project execution: Computer Architecture, Digital Design, Program

languages with Object Oriented programming (C++/SV), Microprocessors

projectGridLines.title: Co-op Engineer
projectGridLines.description:
The ideal candidate has a strong background in a variety of ML models and computer

architecture. Expertise in opensource ML frameworks such as PyTorch, TensorFlow and ONNX-

Runtime is very relevant.

Skill sets:

Strong background in machine learning fundamentals, including deep learning, large

language models, and recommender systems.

Experience working with opensource frameworks such as PyTorch, TensorFlow and ONNX-Runtime.

Strong background in C++ and python programming.


Expected learning: Development of ZenDNN, our flagship CPU inferencing product

Innovating to improve performance and customer ease-of-use on state-of-the-art ML workloads

Specific courses required for project execution: Exposure to compiler technology including LLVM

Scripting languages such as Perl or Python.

projectGridLines.title: Co-op Engineer
projectGridLines.description:
Join our PD implementation team, and make a sizable impact merging the likes of

Machine Learning, Data Science and AI with our existing hardware process. This is great opportunity

to bridge the gap of hardware design with software, data science approach.


Develop and implement machine learning algorithms to improve efficiency and outcomes

Work closely with the data analysis team to identify areas where machine learning can be applied

Analyze and interpret complex data sets to identify patterns and trends

Develop and maintain data models and algorithms

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate machine learning solutions into existing

systems. Stay up-to-date with the latest developments in machine learning and artificial intelligence

Skill sets: Strong programming skills in Python, R, or other relevant languages

Knowledge with machine learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, Keras, or PyTorch
